name: FireRun - 逃生門
description:
"FireRun - 逃生門" takes you into a thrilling and exhilarating 2D world! Embark on an extraordinary adventure in an ordinary 3D environment, breaking through layers of obstacles and utilizing your sprinting abilities to escape. Showcase your skills and courage as you experience heart-pounding challenges in this game!

Game Features:

-Thrilling gameplay experience
-Beautiful fusion of 2D and 3D visuals
-Utilize sprinting abilities
-Intense and suspenseful atmosphere

Are you ready to embrace this heart-pounding challenge? Join us and immerse yourself in this captivating experience!
